Impose Your Will.name: Impose Your Will
Impose Your Will.flavor: As your weapon strikes home, the aspect of your psyche imbued into your weapon burns into your foeâ€™s mind and influences its actions.
Impose Your Will.onHit: 2[W] + ability modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage and any attack it makes provokes opportunity attacks.

Subjugate the Will.name: Subjugate the Will
Subjugate the Will.flavor: With a vicious attack, you fully embed the facet of your soul into your foe, overtaking its mind.
Subjugate the Will.effect: The target is dominated (save ends). While it is dominated, the target gains a bonus to attack rolls equal to your primary ability modifier.

Rebind the Will.name: Rebind the Will
Rebind the Will.flavor: You imbue your weapon with more of the untamed parts of your psyche, transferring those reckless emotions to your enemies.
Rebind the Will.effect: The next melee weapon attack you make with the target weapon dazes any creature it hits until the end of your next turn.
